description: Clean up CLI command sprawl: delete dead code, group commands into proper subcommand trees, deduplicate shared logic. This is prep work for the full CLI rearchitect (Epic #172). All changes in packages/cli/.

stories.title: Delete dead CLI code
stories.description:
Delete all dead/unreachable CLI files that are never imported in packages/cli/src/index.ts. These files are confirmed dead — they have zero imports anywhere:

1. `packages/cli/src/commands/front-stats.ts` (75 lines) — standalone script, never registered
2. `packages/cli/src/commands/front-cache.ts` (1,277 lines) — never wired up, massive dead weight
3. `packages/cli/src/alignment-test.ts` (64 lines) — standalone test script, never imported
4. `packages/cli/src/test-agent-local.ts` (115 lines) — standalone test script, never imported
5. `packages/cli/src/check-apps.ts` (16 lines) — standalone script, never imported
6. `packages/cli/src/commands/eval-local/compare.ts` (171 lines) — hardcoded fake data placeholder, remove from eval-local/index.ts registration too

Also remove `@skillrecordings/sdk` from devDependencies in packages/cli/package.json — it has zero imports in the CLI package.

Add a changeset file (`.changeset/cli-cleanup-dead-code.md`) with:
```
---
"@skillrecordings/cli": patch
---
chore: remove dead CLI code (front-cache, front-stats, alignment-test, test-agent-local, check-apps, eval-local compare stub)
```

Total: approximately -1,718 lines of dead code removed.

stories.title: Group Inngest commands under inngest subcommand
stories.description:
Currently Inngest commands are registered as 3 separate top-level calls in packages/cli/src/index.ts:
- registerEventsCommands(program)
- registerRunsCommands(program)
- registerSignalCommand(program)

Plus `investigate` is in a separate file but registered via events.

Consolidate into a single `packages/cli/src/commands/inngest/index.ts` that:
1. Creates an `inngest` subcommand group on the program
2. Registers events, runs, signal, and investigate as subcommands under it
3. Exports a single `registerInngestCommands(program)` function
4. Update packages/cli/src/index.ts to use the single registration

The commands should work as: `skill inngest events`, `skill inngest runs`, `skill inngest signal`, `skill inngest investigate`

Keep all existing functionality and flags unchanged. This is purely a structural reorganization.

Do NOT create a changeset for this story — it will be included in the final cleanup changeset.
stories.validationCommand: cd packages/cli && bun run check-types && bun run test
acceptanceCriteria: All inngest subcommands work under inngest parent
Events, runs, signal, investigate all accessible

stories.title: Deduplicate eval seed logic
stories.description:
Two near-identical seed files exist:
- `packages/cli/src/commands/eval-local/seed.ts` (276 lines)
- `packages/cli/src/commands/eval-pipeline/seed.ts` (395 lines)

They share functions like: cleanDatabase(), loadJsonFiles(), loadKnowledgeFiles(), seedApps(), seedKnowledgeBase(), generateUUID().

Extract the shared logic into `packages/cli/src/lib/eval-seed.ts`:
1. Use the eval-pipeline version as the base (it's more polished: env var support, batch upsert, title extraction)
2. Extract common functions: cleanDatabase, loadJsonFiles, loadKnowledgeFiles, seedApps, seedKnowledgeBase, generateUUID
3. Update both eval-local/seed.ts and eval-pipeline/seed.ts to import from the shared module
4. Remove duplicated code from both files — they should only contain their command-specific logic

Do NOT create a changeset — will be included in the final changeset.
stories.validationCommand: cd packages/cli && bun run check-types && bun run test
acceptanceCriteria: Both eval-local/seed.ts and eval-pipeline/seed.ts import from shared module
No duplicated function definitions between the two seed files

stories.title: Remove dead auth commands and crypto infrastructure
stories.description:
The age-based encryption auth commands are being replaced by 1Password native integration. Remove the dead infrastructure:

1. Delete `packages/cli/src/commands/auth/keygen.ts` (41 lines) — age key generation, no longer needed
2. Delete `packages/cli/src/commands/auth/encrypt.ts` (81 lines) — age encryption, no longer needed
3. Delete `packages/cli/src/commands/auth/decrypt.ts` (123 lines) — age decryption, no longer needed
4. Delete `packages/cli/src/lib/crypto.ts` (56 lines) — age encryption wrapper, no longer needed
5. Update `packages/cli/src/commands/auth/index.ts` to remove keygen, encrypt, decrypt registrations
6. Keep `auth status` command (still useful)
7. Remove `age-encryption` from dependencies in packages/cli/package.json if no other file imports it (check first!)

Do NOT create a changeset — will be included in the final changeset.

stories.title: Final cleanup: slim index.ts and add changeset
stories.description:
Final cleanup pass on packages/cli/src/index.ts after all previous stories have landed:

1. Review index.ts and ensure all command registrations are clean and grouped logically
2. Remove any stale imports that reference deleted files
3. Ensure the command tree is organized into clear groups:
   - Core: init, wizard, health, db-status
   - Front: front (with subcommands)
   - Inngest: inngest (with subcommands) 
   - Axiom: axiom (with subcommands)
   - Eval: eval, eval-local, eval-pipeline, eval-prompt, pipeline
   - Data: dataset, responses, tools, memory
   - FAQ: faq (with subcommands)
   - Infra: deploys, kb, auth
4. Add comments grouping the registrations logically
5. Create the final changeset file `.changeset/cli-cleanup-command-hygiene.md`:
```
---
"@skillrecordings/cli": minor
---
refactor: CLI command tree hygiene

- Delete ~1,800 lines of dead code (front-cache, front-stats, alignment-test, test-agent-local, check-apps, eval-local compare stub)
- Group Inngest commands under `inngest` subcommand
- Group FAQ commands under `faq` subcommand
- Deduplicate eval seed logic into shared module
- Deduplicate Axiom helpers into shared module
- Remove dead auth commands (keygen, encrypt, decrypt) and age crypto
- Clean up index.ts with logical command grouping
```

Note: if Story 1 already created a changeset, remove it and replace with this comprehensive one.
